subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.8.1 in maven repository?
msgSnippet: We have not traditionally maintained the maven details ourselves, but it appears that our mysterious benefactor isn t fast enough for some users.  Feel free to
messageBody:
We have not traditionally maintained the maven details ourselves, but
it appears that our mysterious benefactor isn't fast enough for some
users. Feel free to vote at

http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/66

if quick maven uploads are an important feature of JUnit's usefulness to you.

David Saff

On Sat, Dec 12, 2009 at 4:14 AM, Bill Shannon <Bill.Shannon@...> wrote:
> I see that JUnit 4.8.1 has been released. Â The newest version in the
> maven repository (http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/) is 4.7.
> Can someone add the newer versions to the maven repository?
>
> Thanks.
